Posts.Content: Sep 7, 2008 08:22PM faith91 wrote: I had 4 drains,  My last one did not come out untill 5 1/2 weeks later,  that one hurt because the skin was crusty and stuck to the tube,  (ouch)  My surg was in March.  I finished chemo a 4 weeks ago and started skin expanding again this week.
